sentence: The servers on the beach are not attentive and the women waitresses have a bit of an attitude
During the day a wide variety of planned activities are available at the activities pool and the beach ie water aerobics beach volleyball etc
The entire Caribbean is experiencing huge amounts of dead seaweed washing ashore but the maintenance people at Le Blanc worked tirelessly to remove it and keep the beach groomed to perfection
The ocean was spectacular and there was very little seaweed
We took some pictures on the beach
I myself had no choice I was heading for the beach
The romantic dinner they offer on the beach is a must3
We also went to The Beach Palace Oriental restaurant for old times sake
We bailed after 9 holes because we would rather go back to the beach pool than wait at a course
I did ask upon arrival if they could upgrade us to a higher floor room with an ocean view explaining we were celebrating an anniversary
25 five minutes froim cancun airport excelent beach
Beautiful rooms as well as the beach and pools are breathing
and of course the juggle act in the 3rd floor bar and the circus performers around the Lagoon pool
Spent most of our stay this time at the beach cabanas with excellent service from Jair Victor Daniel Jorge Christopher and Luis
The room we had overlooked the main pool and ocean and was nicely appointed right down to the chocolates we got every night

It ’s the total package that makes this resort so spectacular from the physical layout of the resort to the restaurants the rooms the pools and the beach ocean the fantastic staff and the many amenities and offerings that are available here
Excellent restaurant selection and beautiful white sand beach hard to beat
Cesar remembered what I liked to drink and had it waiting for me when I arrived back at the room after a long day of lounging on the beach lol
Our dinners at Yama with our waiter Jerry Bela and Teraza under a beautiful moon shining over the ocean were outstanding
The following day we returned from the beach to find a mini chocolate piñata filled with candy and a bottle of champagne along with a note saying “ Happy Birthday ”
